Articles.Content:
The Lykos was heavily inspired by the air superiority aircraft, F-15 "Eagle."

**Modded version (uses** [**BDArmory**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/90/BahamutoDs%20Armory) **and** [**BD Dynamics**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/101/Bahamuto_Dynamics_Parts_pack_v1.1)**)**

Lykos Air superiority fighter (Air-to-Air)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/lepfkmjbyhb6ga4/Lykos%20FA-10%20%28BD%20A-A%29.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-28T05:59:56Z" title="08/28/2015 05:59  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 28, 2015</time> by Yaeah**

I started tinkering with my own F-15 replica, only I got stuck at the wingtips... Hadn't thought to rotate the wings. I may shamelessly steal er flatter you by repurposing that rotate the wing root...

> 
> The Lykos was heavily inspired by the air superiority aircraft, F-15 "Eagle." 
> [http://imgur.com/a/rjxCFd3](http://imgur.com/a/rjxCFd3) the embedded link isn't working atm... here's a direct link [http://imgur.com/rjxCFd3](http://imgur.com/rjxCFd3)
> 
> [Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/qd5vunaoawf1nn8/Lykos%20FA-10.craft?dl=0)

You have imgur linked wrong.

Here is your pic.

![rjxCFd3.jpg](http://imgur.com/rjxCFd3.jpg)

it is coded like this

[ img ] [http://imgur.com/rjxCFd3.jpg](http://imgur.com/rjxCFd3.jpg) [ / img ]

no spaces

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-03T22:41:49Z" title="08/03/2015 10:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 3, 2015</time> by Hodo**

go ahead!

- - - Updated - - -

The embedded link is correct, I think the error may be on Imgur's end

Ill try re-uploading it

> 
> go ahead!
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> The embedded link is correct, I think the error may be on Imgur's end
> 
> Ill try re-uploading it

Not on Imgurs end... it is user error. I fixed it in my post.

If you want the easy way to post individual pictures from imgur here it is in the imgur pic you want to post...

Just click on the pic then choose BBforumcoding and copy that link.

Then just post that line straight into you post and done.
The Lykos has been updated to look more smexy and F-15ish, and now comes with fuel tanks by default
